Each of the articles references a single film. These films all have something in common.
Each of the articles has two numbers throughout the text. These numbers can be used in the grid.
Each of the identified movies is considered a "box office bomb" and is attached to a set of coordinates. What else has bombs scattered throughout a grid?
The film's titles and most of the flavourtext have not been used yet. Take the sums of sets of values hinted at by the flavourtext and index them into their corresponding film's title.
